rating_text: Very good, Great independent grocery store with a wide variety of gourmet items and hard to find food stuffs. A great butcher offering local seafood and grass fed meats. There a good variety of organic fruits and vegetables but not always the freshest (but I'll admit I'm comparing to local farmer's markets). Best grocery store in Mumbai
Very good, Good quality products at low cost than any other and all so many variety of products available, Good parking space and having good ambiance.
Overall Staff is polite and helpful !! All managers are aware of the their products & help customers for their requirements..
